mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, FAC_SEQ_NO AS facSeqNo, RESULT_STEXT_GUBUN AS resultStextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, FAC_CODE AS facCode, FAC_NAME AS facName, ASSET_SEQ_NO AS assetSeqNo, ADOPT_DATE AS adoptDate, WORK_COMPLETE_ENABLE AS workCompleteEnable, WORK_COMPLETE_DATE AS workCompleteDate, UNUSL AS unusl FROM ATMS_02001180

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, FAC_SEQ_NO AS facSeqNo, RESULT_STEXT_GUBUN AS resultStextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, FAC_CODE AS facCode, FAC_NAME AS facName, ASSET_SEQ_NO AS assetSeqNo, ADOPT_DATE AS adoptDate, WORK_COMPLETE_ENABLE AS workCompleteEnable, WORK_COMPLETE_DATE AS workCompleteDate, UNUSL AS unusl FROM ATMS_02001180 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001180 SET FAC_SEQ_NO = #{facSeqNo}, RESULT_STEXT_GUBUN = #{resultStextGubun}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, FAC_CODE = #{facCode}, FAC_NAME = #{facName}, ASSET_SEQ_NO = #{assetSeqNo}, ADOPT_DATE = #{adoptDate}, WORK_COMPLETE_ENABLE = #{workCompleteEnable}, WORK_COMPLETE_DATE = #{workCompleteDate}, UNUSL = #{unusl} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001180 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, FAC_SEQ_NO, RESULT_STEXT_GUBUN, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, FAC_CODE, FAC_NAME, ASSET_SEQ_NO, ADOPT_DATE, WORK_COMPLETE_ENABLE, WORK_COMPLETE_DATE, UNUSL ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{facSeqNo}, #{resultStextGubun}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{facCode}, #{facName}, #{assetSeqNo}, #{adoptDate}, #{workCompleteEnable}, #{workCompleteDate}, #{unusl} )
